description: HwInventory:  A table recording hardware inventory information for RAN cells, including timestamps of changes.  Columns: dateTime (timestamp of record creation), Area_Name (geographic area), CellId (unique cell identifier), Id2 (redundant cell identifier), Id3 (likely an arbitrary identifier), vsDataType (data type identifier), vsDataFormatVersion (version of data format), HwInventory.hwInventoryId (hardware inventory ID), HwInventory.timeOfLatestInvChange (timestamp of last inventory change).
queries: Show me all HwInventory records for Area_Name 'Downtown' where HwInventory.timeOfLatestInvChange is within the last 24 hours.
What is the vsDataFormatVersion for CellId 'XYZ123' in the HwInventory table?
Retrieve all HwInventory entries with vsDataType 'Antenna' and Area_Name 'Suburban West' ordered by dateTime descending.
Find all discrepancies between CellId and Id2 in the HwInventory table for Area_Name 'Airport'.
Give me a count of distinct HwInventory.hwInventoryId values for each Area_Name, ordered by count descending.
